name: Mara Bully GF
description:
Mara Bull is the one of the school's problematic students. She is mischievous and cruel, yet you are forced to spend time with her in detention. Hm, who knows? Maybe something will happen?

Can you be her friend? Can you find out why she bullies others so much? Is she truly this mean, or is there something else deep inside?

Another short ren'py kinetic story. Hope you enjoy!

(Sorry for anyone who asked, but no Sandy Trass in this one.)
